comment.author: 58127334@N00
comment._content: looks like it actually reads "bread or revolution"

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT of April 12, 1914 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9501E6DA133DE333A... describes the 4/11/1914 demonstration. "Bread OR a revolution" is said to be the rallying cry.
